backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and publisher records with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required UI updates for scrollable dropdowns in several frontend modals.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing predefined summaries for numerous frontend files and components.
frontend/.env: Environment file setting the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router, handling authentication and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Modal for creating and editing trained conductors with form state, publisher selection, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog for deleting a conductor using mutation hooks with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component combining sidebar, header, routed content outlet, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header component with menu toggle and logout that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Sidebar with navigation links, mobile toggle behavior, and footer info.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with validation, publisher attachment, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Card displaying a global note with category badge, preview, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal to add a pioneer by selecting a publisher and service year with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a pioneer record with status-aware actions and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal to edit an existing pioneer, pre-filling fields and updating via mutation with validation.
frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing: Dialog confirming deletion of a trained publisher using a mutation with pending state handling.
Modal for creating or editing a trained publisher, handling form state, validation, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal for adding a new publisher with form inputs, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Delet: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing an existing publisher, preloading data, validating fields, and submitting updates.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Publi: Empty file with no implemented content.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit, loading visit data, validating fields, and updating the record.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a new shepherding visit, handling form input, validation, and creation mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal form for creating tasks with validation, date conversion, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing existing tasks, preloading task data and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for adding a new territory with simple validation and create mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted checkout history with optional edit actions.
Modal to check out a territory by selecting a publisher and optional campaign flag, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog to delete a territory note using a delete mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a territory checkout record, supporting publisher selection, date handling, and update mutation submission.
Modal to edit a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory note’s content and saving changes via mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Displays a single territory note with content, date, and edit/delete actions.
Section to create, list, sort, edit, and delete notes for a territory using note-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook to add a publisher, mapping UI privileges to backend format and invalidating publisher queries.
Hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile, tied to actor state and query invalidation.
Mutation hook to check out a territory and invalidate related territory queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook to create a global note with basic validation and invalidation of global notes queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Creates a pioneer via mutation and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Creates a shepherding visit and invalidates the shepherdingVisits query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Creates a task from mapped params and refreshes all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a territory with a generated ID and invalidates territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedCondu: Adds a trained conductor, invalidates its list, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedPubli: Adds a trained publisher with success/error toasts and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note and invalidates the globalNotes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Deletes a task and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedCondu: Deletes a trained conductor with toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedPubli: Deletes a trained publisher and triggers toasts and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries for all global notes or a single global note.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/usePioneers.ts: Fetches all pioneers using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches all publishers or a single publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Retrieves all service meeting conductor assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Fetches, updates (full or notes), and deletes shepherding visits with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks by status or a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Fetches all territories using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Hooks for fetching and mutating territory data, with cache invalidation for single territories and the territory list.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Hooks to fetch and manage notes for a specific territory, invalidating territoryNotes queries on changes.
Provides a query hook to load all trained conductors once the actor is ready.
Provides a query hook to fetch all trained publishers when the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Mutation hook to update a territory checkout record and refresh related territory queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook to edit a global note and invalidate the globalNotes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Mutation hook to update a pioneer and invalidate the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Mutation hook to update publisher details, mapping privileges and invalidating the publishers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Mutation hook for updating a task and invalidating all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Mutation hook to toggle a task’s completion status and refresh task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Mutation hook to update a trained conductor with toast feedback and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedPubli: Mutation hook to update a trained publisher with toast feedback and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for themes and Theiarco color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a 'Coming Soon' message with an icon and title.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page computing publisher, territory, task, and visit stats and displaying recent activity.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProf: Displays details for a specific field service group, including overseer, assistant, and sorted member list with badges. Handles loading, invalid groups, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.ts: Lists all field service groups with overseer, assistant, and active publishers, linking to each group’s profile page. Fetches publishers and organizes data by group number.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with a styled authentication button. Shows loading feedback during the login process.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Manages global notes with category filtering, sorting, creation, editing, and deletion. Fetches notes and publishers while supporting modal dialogs and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Displays all pioneers in a sortable table with options to add, edit, and delete entries. Integrates modal dialogs and loads publisher data for selection.
frontend/src/pages/PublicWitnessing.tsx: Shows a sortable table of trained publishers with training date and authorization status. Supports adding, editing, and deleting trained publisher records via modals and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a single publisher's profile with edit and delete actions, loading states, and privilege badges.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Lists all publishers with filtering, search, and group selection plus add, edit, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Shows trained conductors in a sortable table with add, edit, and delete options.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Manages shepherding visits with search, sorting, and actions to view, record, edit, or delete visits.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays details of a single shepherding visit with note editing, visit editing, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Renders the task list with filtering, add/edit/delete modals, and completion toggling via task-related hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays all territories with status coloring, duration highlighting, and navigation to individual territory profiles.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows details for a single territory with edit, delete, checkout, return, and checkout history management.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfile.tsx: Provides a user profile page allowing editing and saving of name and congregation fields with inline edit controls.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains utility functions for formatting various backend timestamps into human-readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including metadata, existing features, and a new feature request about scrollable dropdown menus in several modals.
